Address.label: Address
Address.value: ONE M&T PLAZA, BUFFALO, New York, 14203, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: M&T Bank Corp is one of the largest regional banks in the United States, with branches in New York, Pennsylvania, West Virginia, Virginia, Maryland, Delaware, and New Jersey. The bank was founded to serve manufacturing and trading businesses around the Erie Canal and is primarily focused on commercial real estate and commercial-related lending, with some retail operations also present.

value.name: Michael Wisler
value.title: Senior Executive VP & Chief Information Officer
